inclusion.criterion: peak urinary flow rate of less than 12 mL/s
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 10 mL/sec of maximum flow rate when urine volume was 130 mL

inclusion.criterion: enlarged prostate gland on digital rectal examination
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of previous surgery for BPH
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has persistent moderate to severe LUTS, peak urinary flow rate of less than 12 mL/s, and an enlarged prostate gland on digital rectal examination. However, there is no clear evidence of history of previous surgery for BPH, urinary tract infection, or prostate/bladder cancer.
